IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default. Please use Generic Mod Config Menu to configure.
api-too-old: Please update {{apiName}}({{APIID}}) to at least version {{minversion}}. Current version {{currentversion}}. Integration disabled.
Scheduler.title: Scheduler
GiftTastes.title: Gift Tastes
UseAlternativeScheduler.title: Use Alternative Scheduler
UseAlternativeScheduler.description: Replaces the game's macro scheduler completely.
AllowModAddedDoors.title: Allow Mod-Added Doors
AllowModAddedDoors.description: Lets mod-added doors be used for pathfinding.
AllowPartialPaths.title: Allow Partial Paths
AllowPartialPaths.description: When enabled, the marcro scheduler can piece together paths from partial paths. It is possible (but not very likely) that this might pick a slightly longer path.
PrePopulateCache.title: Prepopulate Cache
PrePopulateCache.description: If enabled, the cache will be pre-populated with routes from commonly used locations.
OverrideGiftTastes.title: Override Gift Tastes
OverrideGiftTastes.description: Enables this mod's gift taste parsing.
UseGiftTastesCache.title: Use Gift Tastes Cache
UseGiftTastesCache.description: If enabled, gift tastes will be cached.
